title:
Cordless Handheld Standard Range Area Imager Kit with Presentation Cradle and USB Kit, Black,
Compatible Devices: Laptop, Desktop, Power Source: Corded Electric, Usb Cable, 3 AAA batteries required.
descriptions:
Product name: Cordless Handheld Standard Range Area Imager Kit with Presentation Cradle and USB Kit, Black.

This is a Zebra cordless handheld barcode scanner for general purpose. It reads 1D and 2D barcodes. It is good for retail store and hospitality front desk, counter, or back office. The design is ergonomic and lightweight for long time use in hand.

What is in the kit:
- Handheld area imager scanner, black
- Presentation cradle for hands-free scanning
- USB cable/USB kit
- Uses 3 AAA batteries (included or user supply, depending on your region)

Main functions:
- Standard range area imaging, reads from paper labels and screens
- Omni-directional scanning, no need to align the barcode
- Aim line guidance (helps to target the code)
- Pre-configured from factory for fast start
- Auto-host cables, simple connection by USB to laptop or desktop

Connections and power:
- Connectivity: USB cable to computer (laptop or desktop)
- Power source options: corded electric via USB, or 3 x AAA batteries for cordless use
- Number of batteries: 3, type AAA

Use case:
- Retail point of sale, price check, inventory
- Hospitality check-in, ticket scan, loyalty card

Why choose this model:
- Easy to set up, just plug USB and start
- Comfortable to hold, lightweight for long shift
- Works hands-free on the presentation cradle, or handheld when needed
- Reliable Zebra brand for daily business operation

Color: Black.

If you need more information about compatibility with your system, please tell us your OS and software. We are happy to support.
